<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Barrel & Bullet Saloon](/Articles.aspx?ID=60)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 66

Thrilling bounties, mysterious strangers, and Flaming Whiskeys—what more could a gang of outlaws ask for? Drink up at the legendary Barrel & Bullet!
name: Barrel & Bullet Saloon
